SA19nagsaliu:3_0: bhoṭabhāṣāyām - hphagaspā - salu - jaṅapā - śesvyavā - thegpā - chenapoī - doī - gyācher bśadpā
SA19nagsaliu:6_0: tatra 'anantācintyaguṇyaṃ hi' ityādiṣu anantaguṇyamiti guṇaṃ hi balābhayāsaṃsṛṣṭādiguṇārthe devamanuṣyaiḥ pariceyatvāt,
SA19nagsaliu:6_1: sevyatvāt, abhyasanīyatvād, bhāvanīyatvāt, sākṣātkaraṇīyatvāt prāptakaraṇīyatvācca guṇāḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:6_2: te guṇāstu bahavaḥ / anantācintyeti samastaṃ padam /
SA19nagsaliu:6_5: katama iti cet, ucyate - sambuddhaṃ karuṇātmakam /
SA19nagsaliu:7_1: bodhatvād vā buddhaḥ / ajñānanidrā suptajaganmadhye jāgratapuruṣavat,
SA19nagsaliu:7_4: yathā - parādhīnasya svayameva pratisaṃvedana-dharmatattvāva-bodhavad unmārgabhrāntacittasya saṃsārāṭavīkāntāre janma-jarā-vyādhi-maraṇādi-pīḍitasya vividhadarśanagahanavane kleśāśīviṣabhayāplutāna itastataḥ paribhramato 'nyāṃścāpi sanmārge sanniveśya mokṣānuttaramahānagare praveśakāritvād buddha iti /
SA19nagsaliu:8_3: sa sambuddhaḥ ; karuṇātmakatāyā api bhūtatvāt saṃbuddhaḥ karuṇātmakaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:8_4: tasmāt taṃ buddhaṃ karuṇātmakaṃ praṇipatya śālistambamiti ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:8_6: praṇipatya kiṃ karomīti cet- śālistambamiti sūtrasya upanibaddhaśāstrakārikāṃ pravakṣyāmi /
SA19nagsaliu:8_7: ityuktam / tatra anantācintyaguṇyo hi ityanena svārthasampattirdarśitā /
SA19nagsaliu:8_9: sambuddhaṃ iti buddho hi (adhigatārthatvāt) sarvajña eva /
SA19nagsaliu:8_12: tasmāt tādṛśaṃ sarvajñaṃ viraktaṃ sambuddhaṃ karuṇātmaka iti yaḥ sarvaṃjānan vītarāgaḥ,
SA19nagsaliu:8_13: sa ācāryamuṣṭerabhāvād aparān yathāvagataṃ dharmaṃ diśati /
SA19nagsaliu:8_16: tathāpi, vivakṣitapadasya vidyamānatvād vivakṣuṇā kimiṣyate? iti praśnaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:8_17: uttaraṃ - pravakṣyāmi / kiṃ vakṣyāmi? ucyate - śālistambasūtropanibaddha-śāstra-kārikām /
SA19nagsaliu:8_18: śāstraṃ racayitum ādau sambandha-prayojana-abhidhānābhidheyacatuṣṭayaṃ kiṃ na nirvacanīyam?
SA19nagsaliu:9_3: asambaddhāditvāditi hetuḥ / avabodhakatvāt hetuḥ, hetvarthasya tu avabodhakatvāt /
SA19nagsaliu:9_6: evaṃ vādine ucyate - asambandhāditvāditi yaduktaṃ ityuktahetorasiddham uktāyām atroktau sambandhādayaścatvāraḥ santyeva /
SA19nagsaliu:9_7: te ca katame? ucyate - śālistambasūtropanibaddha-śāstrakārikāyāḥ vakṣyamāṇatvād atra sambandhaḥ syād eva /
SA19nagsaliu:9_8: śālistambasūtramiti tīrthikādyanyeṣu granthaviśeṣaṇatayā anupalabdhatvāt śāstramidaṃ buddhasambaddham /
SA19nagsaliu:9_11: tasmāduktam atra prayojanam - hetupratyayārthāvagamārthaṃ pudgala-nairātmya-dharmanairātmya-grāhya-grāhakābhāvāva gamāt kleśajñeyāvaraṇaṃ vibhajya anuttara-samyaksaṃbuddhopalabdhiḥ atra prayojanamastyeva /
SA19nagsaliu:10_1: yadyad sārthakaṃ tat tat tu viracanīyam /
SA19nagsaliu:10_3: asyābhidhānena śālistambopamayā ādhyātmika-bāhya-pratītyasamutpāda-samupayogād anenābhidhānena śālistambamiti cāpi bhavati /
SA19nagsaliu:10_5: abhidheyamiti pratītyasamutpādasya dvādaśāṅgasya sapratyayasya pṛthaktaḥ yathākramaṃ lakṣaṇavyavasthāpanāt kartrādīn ahetūn pratikūlahetūn ca vihāya kleśopakleśa prahāṇāt samyagjñānam utpādya anuttaradharmakāyopalambhād idamabhidheyamapyastyeva /
SA19nagsaliu:10_8: ārambhaṇīyameva/ ārambhaṇīyamiti dharmaḥ / śāstramiti ca dharmī / dharmadharmisādhāraṇo hi pakṣaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:10_11: prayojanābhāvāt, kākadantaparīkṣādiśāstravat ityasya hetvarthasya siddhatvaṃ darśayitumucyate -
SA19nagsaliu:11_1: kimarthamiti cet, śāstre tatra ca gauravotpādahetubhūtatvād,
SA19nagsaliu:11_3: ajātagauravāṇāṃ tu abhūtatvād hetvarthe ca siddha eva /
SA19nagsaliu:11_4: api śiṣṭācāra-nayapradarśanārthaṃ śāstrārambhe śāstuḥ pūjā kṛtā /
SA19nagsaliu:11_6: yadā kaścit prayojanārambhaṇamavatarati prathamam iṣṭadevaṃ praṇamya viśiṣṭaprayojanaṃ praviśati,
SA19nagsaliu:11_7: abhīṣṭārtho 'ciraṃ sidhyati, tasmād anenāpi śāstrakāreṇa tāmeva sadācāranītim anusaratā śāstrārambhaṇe svaśāsturguṇābhidhānapūrvakaṃ praṇāmaṃ kṛtvā śāstravyākhyānāvatārād atra prayojanamastyeva /
SA19nagsaliu:11_8: ucyate - śāstrārambhe śāstre praṇāmakaraṇam na niṣphalam śāstari śāstreṣu ca gauravotpādahetvartham,
SA19nagsaliu:11_9: nānyathā / tataḥ śāstrārambhe śāstuḥ pūjanaṃ vyavasthitameva /
SA19nagsaliu:11_10: tasmācca paraiḥ śāstrādau praṇāmakaraṇaṃ niṣprayojanam iti kimucyate? taddhetorasiddhatāṃ darśayitum kathitam /
SA19nagsaliu:11_11: śāstram ārabdhuṃ praṇāmakaraṇaṃ tu cikitsādiśāstravat saprayojanam eva,
SA19nagsaliu:11_12: na ca kākadantaparīkṣāvat / svaśāstāraṃ praṇamya śālistambasūtropanibaddhāṃ śāstrakārikāṃ pravakṣyāmīti ukte /
SA19nagsaliu:11_13: katamā ca sā iti cet - munī rājagṛhasyaiva ityādi kathitam rājagṛhaṃ tu rājño gṛham rājaprasāda ityarthaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:12_2: kasmācchrutamiti / tasmāduktam / bhagavataḥ ekasmin samaye iti ekasmin samaye /
SA19nagsaliu:12_4: kiṃ bhagnavān iti cet / tasmāduktam māracatuṣṭayam / kleśa-skandha-devaputra-mṛtyavo mārā ityākhyātāḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:12_6: darśana-bhāvanā-mārgāvatāranayena catuḥ smṛtyupasthānādisaptatriṃśadbodhipākṣikadharmabhāvanākrameṇa caturāryasatyabhāvanāvibhāvanatayā skandhatathatāparijñānena anitya-duḥkha-śūnya-nairātmyādīnām aviparīta-jñānānvitatvāt pudgaladharmayornairātmya-grāhyagrāhakābhāva-kalpanād 'idaṃ dhātutrayamapi cittamātram' iti avagamāt kleśajñeyāvaraṇa-rahitadvāreṇa kleśā bhagnāḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:12_7: nitya-sukha-śuci-sātmyāviparyāsacatuṣṭayādirahitaḥ anuttaradharmakāya saṃyukto 'pratiṣṭhita nirvāṇopalabdheḥ skandhaṃ mṛtyumārañca jayati /
SA19nagsaliu:13_0: sarvadharmān māyā-marīci-gandharvanagara-nirmāṇa-pratibimba-pratiśrutka-alātacakra-svapnavat svavabodhāt saṃkleśālayavijñāna-vāsanā-malāpagatatvācca abhūtasaṃkalpān samucchidya mahāmaitryādi-bāṇākṣepeṇa sasainyaṃ makaradhvajaṃ prahṛtya devaputramāraṃ parājayata /
SA19nagsaliu:15_3: yadā tannagare kupitairamānuṣaiḥ punaḥ punaragniḥ kṣiptastadā rājāvagatya ādiśat,
SA19nagsaliu:15_4: jñānino nāgarikāḥ / adya prabhṛti yasya gṛhaṃ prathamaṃ agninā dahyate,
SA19nagsaliu:15_5: sa śītavanaṃ mahāśmaśānaṃ gatvā gṛhaṃ nirmāya vased ityājñātavān /
SA19nagsaliu:15_7: tato rājā amātyānāhūyādiśat - jñānina amātyāḥ jānantu evaṃ,
SA19nagsaliu:15_8: mayaiva tannayaprajñāpāt mayaiva tadatikramo mayi na śobhate,
SA19nagsaliu:15_9: anayatvāt / jñānino mantriṇaḥ / śītavane mahāśmaśānamadhye rājaprāsādo nirmīyatām (ahaṃ) tatra gatvā vatsyāmi /
SA19nagsaliu:16_0: tadā prathamaṃ rājā tatra gatvā uvāsa /
SA19nagsaliu:16_3: yasya parvatasya śikharo gṛdhraśirovat sa gṛdhrakūṭaparvata ityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:16_4: athavā pāpena māreṇa gṛdhrākāramabhinirmāya bhagavaccīvaraharaṇārambhe bhagavato 'dhiṣṭhānenā - sāmarthyāt tatraiva nikṣiptaṃ,
SA19nagsaliu:16_8: kimekākī eva? ucyate / na, bhikṣūṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ saṃghaiḥ sārdhaṃ vyavasthitaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:16_9: bhikṣūṇāṃ arthāt bhikṣusārdhamardhatrayodaśabhiḥ mahatā bhikṣusaṅghena bodhisattvānāṃ ca iti tu saṃbahulaiśca bodhisattva-mahāsattvaiḥ sārdham /
SA19nagsaliu:16_16: api ca - kimarthaṃ sthāna-kāla-parivāra-nirdeśaḥ? ucyate - cakravartirājasādharmyāt /
SA19nagsaliu:17_0: yadā brāhmaṇeṣu gṛhastheṣu ca anugrahādi kṛtaṃ tadā nivāsa-sthānaṃ grāma-nagarādi,
SA19nagsaliu:17_1: yatra sthitvā tatkāryaṃ, sthānaṃ nirucyate / kasmin sthāne? amuke / ādhipatyaṃ pradarśayituṃ amātyādibhiḥ sārdham iti/
SA19nagsaliu:17_4: kutreti? rājagṛhe / ekasmin samaye tu prātaḥ kāle /
SA19nagsaliu:20_0: kutra kaiścit samaṃ kvāpi kasmāt kasmai ca deśitam /
SA19nagsaliu:25_1: dvādaśāṅgaḥ bhikṣurbhikṣuṇī anyo vā yaḥ kaścit kṛtādikaṃ ahetu-pratikūlahetu-virahitaṃ paśyati,
SA19nagsaliu:27_0: aṣṭāṅgamāryadharmaṃ phaladharmādhigamasvabhāvatāṃ saskandhanirvāṇaṃ aśeṣa skandhābhidhānamapi ca yathāvat paśyati ityuktvā bhagavāṃstūṣṇīṃ bhāvamavasthitaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:27_1: tadā ityādi tu bhikṣuśāriputro bodhisattvaṃ maitreyam upasaṃkramyedaṃ paryapṛcchat /
SA19nagsaliu:27_2: ityuktvā iti bhagavataḥ śāriputreṇa yatsūtraṃ śrutaṃ tad bhikṣūn uktvā upadiśya /
SA19nagsaliu:27_3: nāyaka iti vividhopāyanayena sattvānām nayanatvān nāyakaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:27_4: tūṣṇīṃbhāvamavasthitaḥ samādhiṃ samāpadya viharati sm ityadhivacanam /
SA19nagsaliu:27_5: bhikṣuḥ śāriputraḥ śrutvā ityuvāca bhikṣuḥ iti - kleśabhañjanād bhikṣuḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:27_6: śāriputraḥ śrutvā iti tu bhagavataḥ śrutvā /
SA19nagsaliu:27_7: sūtre tadāyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yatretyādinā deśitavān /
SA19nagsaliu:27_8: gatvā maitreyasannidhau tu yatra bodhisattvo maitreyo dine sadāvasthitaḥ,
SA19nagsaliu:27_9: tatra gatvā, ubhau śilātale upaviśatām / athāyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyaṃ bodhisattvametadavocat -
SA19nagsaliu:28_0: tathāgate 'dya maitreya uktyarthaṃ na vibhajya ca /
SA19nagsaliu:28_1: tṛṣṇīṃbhāve sthite cātra tadartho gamyate katham / ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:29_0: adya maitreya ityuktvā bhikṣūn bhagavān śālistambopamādeśanayā yaduktam - maitreya! sugatoktasūtrāntārthaḥ katamaḥ? bhagavatāpyartho na vibhaktaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:29_1: sarvajñagocara-viṣayāṇāmapi sarvaśrāvaka-pratyekabuddha-viṣayātikrāntatvāt pratītyasamutpādaḥ katamaḥ? dharmaḥ katamaḥ? buddhaḥ katamaḥ? ityādi apṛcchat /
SA19nagsaliu:30_0: kiṃ pratītyaṃ ca dharmaḥ kaḥ buddho 'pi katamastathā / ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:31_0: kathaṃ ca pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyan dharmaṃ paśyati / dharmaṃ paśyan buddhaṃ paśyati? iti tu
SA19nagsaliu:32_0: pratītyaṃ tu kathaṃ dṛṣṭvā dharmaṃ buddhaṃ ca paśyati /
SA19nagsaliu:33_0: sthaviraśāriputraḥ tatsandehotpādād ajitamāha / ajitastu maitreyaḥ / kiṃ viśeṣaṇako maitreyaḥ?
SA19nagsaliu:34_0: bhāvātmikā hi maitrī syān maitreyo 'brūta nirṇayam /
SA19nagsaliu:35_1: nirṇayamiti tu niścayaḥ / abrūteti udīritavān / kamiti cet? śāriputram / kimuktamiti cet anna bhagavatā ityādi uktam /
SA19nagsaliu:35_5: saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānam / vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpam / nāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanam /
SA19nagsaliu:36_0: upādānapratyayo bhavaḥ / bhavapratyayā jātiḥ / jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇam / jarāmaraṇapratyayāḥ śoka-parideva-duḥkha-daurmanasyopāyāsāḥ sambhavanti /
SA19nagsaliu:36_1: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati /
SA19nagsaliu:36_3: tatra pratītyasamutpādo nāma sahetukaḥ sapratyayo nāhetuko nāpratyayaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:37_1: api ca - avidyādibhavāṅgādīnām ayaṃ sambhavakramaḥ kathamavagantavyaḥ? lakṣaṇaṃ katamat? karma ca katamad iti cet? ucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:37_4: sa ca pratītyasamutpādo bāhya ādhyātmikaśca pṛthaktvād dvividho vyavasthāpitaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:37_8: na hi phalotpāda iti / bījasya naivaṃ bhavati ahamaṅkuramabhinirvartayāmīti /
SA19nagsaliu:37_9: aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ bījenābhinirvartita iti /
SA19nagsaliu:37_10: evaṃ yāvat puṣpasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati phalamabhinirvartayāmīti /
SA19nagsaliu:37_11: phalasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahamaṅkura-puṣpābhyām abhinirvartita iti /
SA19nagsaliu:37_12: atha punarbīje sati aṅkurāt phalaparyantaṃ prādurbhavati /
SA19nagsaliu:38_1: ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāyāt / katameṣāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāmiti /
SA19nagsaliu:38_4: bījaṃ pṛthivyādau kiṃ hitaṃ kṛtvā hetoḥ pratyayaṃ matamiti /
SA19nagsaliu:38_6: snehanaṃ, pācanaṃ, nirharaṇam, anāvaraṇaṃ pariṇāmanāṃ ca kramaśaḥ karoti /
SA19nagsaliu:38_7: asatsveṣu na bhavati / yadāvikalo bhavati, tataḥ sarveṣāṃ samavāyād tadbhavati /
SA19nagsaliu:38_8: pṛthivyādau rnaivaṃ bhavati vayaṃ bījasaṃdhāraṇādi karomīti /
SA19nagsaliu:38_9: bījasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ eteṣāṃ pratyayena saṃdhāraṇādi kāryeṇa hitaṃ karomi /
SA19nagsaliu:38_10: atha punaḥ pṛthivyādiṣu satsu bījādaṅkurādi prādurbhavati,
SA19nagsaliu:38_11: asatsu ca na bhavati / tasmādeva sūtrakāreṇa uktam /
SA19nagsaliu:40_0: ityādi / bhavāṅgo yeṣāmavidyādimaraṇāntam asti, te avidyādi maraṇaparyantāḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:41_0: tasmāttarhi bhavantyeva duḥkhaskandhā hi kevalam / tasmād iti tu avidyādi kramaśaḥ prādurbhavati /
SA19nagsaliu:42_0: duḥkhaskandhastu duḥkha-samūhaḥ / kevalamiti ātmātmīyaviyuktaḥ / bhavati iti tu utpadyate /
SA19nagsaliu:44_5: tasmāt kudṛṣṭitvāt mithyā mārgācaraṇena aniṣṭavipākābhinirvartitatvāt hetu-karma-phalāni apavādāropākāreṇa praviṣṭatvān mithyādṛṣṭiriti /
SA19nagsaliu:44_8: samyakmārgopayogād abhīṣṭaphalābhinirhāratvād anitya-duḥkha-śūnya-nairātmyā-dyākāreṇa praviṣṭa tvāt samyakdṛṣṭiriti /
SA19nagsaliu:45_5: samyaṅnāma aviparyāsaḥ / saṃkalpastu kriyā, cintanaṃ ca idamidaṃ kariṣya iti ādau citte nidhāya kāya-vāk-citta-caryākuśalaḥ,
SA19nagsaliu:45_7: anitya-duḥkha-śūnya-nairātmyādisu niyojito yo yoniśomana sikārayogaḥ (sa) samyaṅmārgāṅgam ityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:45_8: mithyāvāgiti durvacanam / svaparavisaṃvādākārapravṛttā yā vāk sā mithyāvāk /
SA19nagsaliu:45_14: catuḥsatyānukūlakaraṇā, sarvakuśaladharmasaṃgrahā hita-paricchinna-svarūpatvād ātmastuti-parapaṃsanavihīnā anitya-duḥkha-śūnya(tā)-nairātmyādi-rūpeṇa pravṛtteḥ sarvārya janāvisaṃvādinī samyaṅmārgānusāritvāt samyagvāg ityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:46_1: karmeti kāya-vāk-citta-duṣkṛta-bījavapanād akṣayavipākaphalābhinirvartita-svabhāvākuśala-karmānta-kāritvāt kṣārādidoṣasaṃsṛṣṭakukṣetre kubījavapanavad anabhīṣṭavipākābhi-nirvartitatvāt paṃsanīyaḥ karmāntastu mithyākarmānta ityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:46_7: samyak karmānta-kāritvāt, samyak karmāntaḥ, sanmārgānusaraṇatvāt samyakmārga ityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:47_0: mithyājīvastu viparītājīvaḥ / kapaṭa-lapana-naiṣpeśikatva-naimittikatvena pravṛtya avipanna-kāya-vāgādyupajīvikayā puruṣa-stryādi-nimittadeśanena astra-aśva-kāvya-cikitsāparīkṣā-saṃkhyā-gṛhasthaparīkṣā-kumāraparīkṣā-sāmudrika-lakṣaṇaparīkṣā-nimittajñānādau svaparavisaṃvādarūpeṇa pravṛtteḥ tannayena cīvara-piṇḍādi-sādhanānuvṛttyā vihārastu mithyājīva ityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:48_1: yā kāyavākcittacaryāsvaparopakāra-mātrakuśalapravṛtyā āryamārgam anusarati sā samyagvyāyāmatvāt samyakvyāyāmaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:48_2: sa mārgāṅgameva ucyate / mithyā smṛtiriti kutsanīyā smṛtiḥ mithyāsmṛtiḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:48_3: smṛtistu smaraṇam / iyam mithyā smṛtiścāpi bhūtatvān mithyāsmṛtiḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:48_8: guṇānusmaraṇaṃ pūrvīkṛtya buddha-dharma-saṃgha-śīla-tyāga-devādyanusmaraṇaṃ samyaksmṛtiḥ mārgāṅgam eva ucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:48_11: sa tu mithyāpi san, samādhirapi bhūtatvān mithyāsamādhiḥ mithyeti tu viparyayaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:48_13: api tu-rūpādi-bāhyavastūni anitya-duḥkha-śūnya-nairātmyākārīṇi nitya-sukha-śucyātma dṛṣṭayāditayā adhyavasīya teṣu ālambanapūrvakaṃ yaccittaspharaṇam,
SA19nagsaliu:48_21: evam yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati sa dharmaṃ paśyati /
SA19nagsaliu:49_1: viśuddhātmā hi yaḥ paśyed dharmatathyaṃ sa paśyati /
SA19nagsaliu:50_0: phalaṃ tuṃ śrāmaṇyaphalam / tatprāptistu sākṣātkaraṇam / sarvasaṃkleśālaya-vijñānabījavāsanāmalāpagatatvād āśrayaparāvṛttimayaṃ manogocarācintyā-prameyaguṇamaṇyalaṅkṛtāyāḥ svaparādhīnātmaka pratyātmavedyasarvasattvārthanirantarānābhoga kṛtātma-sarvaprapañcarahitāyāḥ śamathavipaśyanā-yuganaddha-sarvadharma-tathatāyāḥ adhigamatvāt kleśa-jñeyāvaraṇagirigahvaravanamūla-vidahanasvabhāvatānuttarasamyak-saṃphalaṃ śaikṣajñānaṃ tu phala dharma ityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:52_1: ajaram, amaram, atāpaṃ, sthiraṃ, śāntaṃ, nityam, asaṃhāryam, akṣayātmakam, ādimadhyāntarahitam advayaṃ dhātutrayavirahitaṃ kāya-vāk-cittakarmasamatikrāntaṃ maṇiratnarājavividharūpasadṛśaṃ guṇamaṇivividhaprabhābhiḥ nirantaraṃ jagadarthakāri śāntaṃ,
SA19nagsaliu:55_0: tathoktamāryaṃ dṛṣṭatvād yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati /
SA19nagsaliu:56_2: āryastu lokottaraḥ / paśyatīti cakṣuṣā / yaḥ paśyatīti yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ dharmañcaivaṃ paśyati sa dharmajaḥ,
SA19nagsaliu:57_0: tatrātra pratītyasamutpādaḥ kīdṛśa ukta iti cet /
SA19nagsaliu:57_2: prāṇādirahitād yaśca iti tu yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ satataṃ prāṇādirahitaṃ prāṇarahitam,
SA19nagsaliu:57_4: māpanam, kalpanām, upaparīkṣaṇañca karoti, satatamajīvamiti tu nirjīvam /
SA19nagsaliu:57_6: imāni sarvāṇi bāhyābhyantarāṇi vastūni sajīvāni indriyānvitāni /
SA19nagsaliu:57_9: ye prāṇinaḥ prāṇino na bhakṣanti te prāṇinastu mokṣaṃ prāpnuvantīti ucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:57_12: hetustu bījādi / pratyayaśca pṛthivyādi / te 'pi parasparamanyonyakalpanā-parikalpanā-vikalpa-rahitvāt tṛṇa-vṛkṣa-bhitti-dharmasadṛśā acalāḥ niṣkriyāśca tasmāt prāṇādirahitatvād ajīvāḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:58_2: calatvāt, suptatvāt, chinne 'pi utpādatvāditi, yā vyavahāraprajñaptistādṛśī nāsti /
SA19nagsaliu:58_3: bāhyavastuṣu sūryasya candrasya ca sparśavaśena layo vistaraśca anumīyete /
SA19nagsaliu:58_4: kva teṣāṃ śayanotthānam? vāyusañcāravaśād vṛkṣa-śākhādi-kampanānumānāt teṣāṃ gamanāgamanaṃ kuta upalabhyate /
SA19nagsaliu:58_5: artho 'siddha eva / chinne utpāda iti ayam artho 'siddha eva iti darśayitum ucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:58_6: yadi so 'pi sacetanaḥ syat, kasmāt chedanāvasthāyāṃ prāṇātipattītyādi duḥkhaṃ nānubhavati /
SA19nagsaliu:58_7: anicchādicaryāṃ prārthanādiṃ vā tato 'nyatragamanaṃ vālpamapi na kurvanti /
SA19nagsaliu:58_10: sacetanānām aṅga-pratyaṅgādicchedānutpāda-dharmitvād acetanatāyā eva prasaṅgo jāyate /
SA19nagsaliu:58_25: vyupaśāntyantamiti tu upaśamam ante darśayituṃ vyupaśamaparyantam /
SA19nagsaliu:58_26: yastu etādṛśanayena dharmaṃ satatam ajīvādisvabhāvaṃ paśyati /
SA19nagsaliu:59_0: pratītyaṃ dharmabuddhau ca śuddhibuddhayā hi paśyati /
SA19nagsaliu:60_1: iti bhagavatā uktam / ityasyārthastu yaḥ paśyati / āryadharmamabhisaṃbudhya iti tu yo pāpadharmāṇāṃ pāre arthāt dūre sa āryaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:60_2: teṣāṃ dharma āryadharmaḥ, samyakdṛṣṭirityādiḥ / abhisaṃbudhyeti abhimukhe ekāgratākaraṇāt sākṣātkaraṇācca samādhiprāpterityadhivacanam /
SA19nagsaliu:60_7: niśādā-putravat / buddha iti dharmāvabodhāt / tathāpi yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati sa dharmakṛtānuttarabodhyaśaikṣasvabhāvatāṃ paśyati /
SA19nagsaliu:60_8: yena sa āryajñānagocaradharmaṃ tādṛśaṃ svayathāvad abhisaṃbodheḥ dharmajñaḥ,
SA19nagsaliu:60_9: dharmanirmāṇaṃ dharmadarśanam buddhadarśanam iti bhagavatā uktam /
SA19nagsaliu:63_0: buddhotpādo bhavenno vā sthiteyaṃ dharmatā yataḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:64_2: atrāhetuḥ pratikūlahetuḥ vā pravartako nivartako vā ko 'pi nāsti /
SA19nagsaliu:64_3: tasmāt tathāgatānāmutpādādvā anutpādād vā dharmato dharmasthitito dharmaniyamataśca eṣa pravāhaḥ,
SA19nagsaliu:64_4: ityuktam / yadi pratyayarahitena ekenaiva hetunā bhāvā utpadya tiṣṭhanti,
SA19nagsaliu:64_5: yadi pratyayo 'pi hetumanapekṣya kiñcidutpādayituṃ samarthaḥ cettadā te sthitā asthitā iti vaktuṃ yujyeta,
SA19nagsaliu:64_6: teṣāmutpādaḥ phalodbhavo 'pi nāhetor na cāpratyayāt tathāgatānāmutpādo vānutpādo vā eṣā dharmatā dharmasthitatā ca āditaḥ pravartete /
SA19nagsaliu:65_0: tadyathā - pratītyasamutpādasya dharma etatpratyayatāphalamiti bhagavatā pratītyasamutpādaḥ saṃkṣepeṇa uktaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:65_4: hetupratyaya-kramavat pratītyasamutpādasamateti hetvabhāve pratyayāpravṛttiḥ pratyayābhāve ca na hetu-pravṛttiḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:65_9: aviparyayateti anukūlatvāt / evamapi pratītyasamutpādo 'yam ityādi hetupratyayadvividhatvād hetupratyayobhayārtha pratītyasamutpādasya kramo 'bhyupagantavyaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:67_0: evaṃ bāhyādhyātmikaviśeṣeṇa pṛthag hetupratyayānāṃ lakṣaṇa-bhedaḥ kīdṛśa iti cet /
SA19nagsaliu:69_0: tatra katamo bāhyaḥ sahetukaḥ pratītyasamutpāda iti uktvā tadidam - bījādaṅkuraḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:69_1: aṅkurāt patram / patrāt kāṇḍam / kāṇḍānnālam / nālādgaṇḍaḥ gaṇḍād garbham [garbhācchūkaḥ] puṣpāt phalam ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:73_2: tatra bījasya naivaṃ bhavati ahamaṅkurādi abhinirvartayāmi iti /
SA19nagsaliu:73_3: aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ bījādinā abhinirvartitaḥ iti /
SA19nagsaliu:73_4: evaṃ yāvat puṣpasya naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ phalamabhinirvartayāmīti /
SA19nagsaliu:73_5: phalasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ puṣpeṇābhinirvartita iti /
SA19nagsaliu:73_6: atha punarbīje sati aṅkurāditaḥ phalādi paryantaṃ prādurbhāvaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:73_7: asati na bhavati / evaṃ bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya hetūpanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:74_0: pratyayastu pṛthivyādi kālāntaṃ hi yathā kramam /
SA19nagsaliu:75_0: tasmādeva kathaṃ bāhyapratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavya ityādi uktam /
SA19nagsaliu:75_1: bāhyapratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandhāḥ katidhā draṣṭavyā ityuktam ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāyāt /
SA19nagsaliu:75_2: katameṣāṃ ṣaṇṇāmiti / pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśartudhātūnāṃ yathākramaṃ samavāyād bāhyapratītyasamutpādasyeti pratyayatā yathākramam /
SA19nagsaliu:75_3: kramo yathāvad jñātavyaḥ / eṣām hetupratyayānāṃ katamasya karma katamad iti cet? tasmād uktam /
SA19nagsaliu:77_0: tatra pṛthivīdhāturbījasya saṃdhāraṇakṛtyaṃ karotīti bījamaṅkurotpādonmukhamāśrayatvāt kaṭhinatvameva ucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:77_2: tejo dhātuḥ paripācayatīti paripuṣṭayavasare upapadyamāne paraspara-sparśeṇoṣṇatā eva paripāka iti ucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:78_1: svāvasthāyāḥ samuddhṛtya bahirā nayanād vāyudhāturbījamabhinirharati vardhayatīti ucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:78_4: ṛturapi bījasya pariṇāmanakṛtyaṃ karotīti ṛturapi sarvākāraṃ abhinirharati /
SA19nagsaliu:79_0: no cet pratyayasāmagrī bīje bhūte 'pi nāṅkuraḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:80_0: tasmādeva uktam / sarvasamavāyād bīje niruddhe tato 'bhinirhāraḥ syāt /
SA19nagsaliu:82_0: tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ saṃghātakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
SA19nagsaliu:82_1: tadvat jale agnau, vāyau, ākāśe, ṛtau cāpi naivaṃ bhavati / ātmātmīyagrahābhāvānna karmaphala-prajñapti-praṇāśaḥ,
SA19nagsaliu:83_0: na svato parato nāpi na dvayoḥ kartṛkālataḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:84_0: svata iti hetupratyayābhāve svata utpādaḥ / svabhāvavādina evaṃ kalpanta iti śrūyate /
SA19nagsaliu:85_1: atra na kaścidutpadyate na ca kaścin nirudhyate /
SA19nagsaliu:87_3: hetupratyayatābhyupagamaḥ / tasmād vastūnāṃ svabhāvata utpādo na yujyate,
SA19nagsaliu:87_4: utpattimatvād ghaṭādivat / yasyānusāraṃ bhāvāḥ satataṃ sthitāḥ tadanusāram utpāda-kriyā-karma-sthiti-vināśā api na yujyante,
SA19nagsaliu:88_0: tasmād atra doṣasya prasajyamānatvān na svata ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:88_2: ākāśavat / kasyacidapi kutrāpi kadāpi utpādo nirodho vā nāstīti cet- ucyate- pratyakṣavirodhaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:88_4: tasmāt tāvad bhāvānāṃ na svabhāvata utpādaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:88_5: parataḥ iti ātmataḥ / pareṣāmutpādako vināśakaścātmāstīti śrūyate /
SA19nagsaliu:89_0: tathā sati gamana-āgamana-calana-kampana-nirākaraṇa-manyanā-kriyā-karmāṇi tatraiva anyatrāpi ca pravartante /
SA19nagsaliu:89_1: cakṣurādiḥ ātmaguṇaḥ, parārthatvāt, śayanādyaṅgavaditi / parasaṃjñā tu ātmani satyevocyate /
SA19nagsaliu:89_2: cakṣurādiḥ tadguṇatvāt, tadarthastu parārthaḥ / yathā śayanādi parairupayuktatvāt parārthamitivat parārthatvāditi /
SA19nagsaliu:89_3: ayaṃ hetuḥ śayanopamayā na yujyate saṃghātatvāt /
SA19nagsaliu:89_4: ātmātvasaṃghātasvarūpaḥ / katham ātmā asaṃghātaḥ san svaśarīrābhāve śayanādīn aṅgasaṃghān svarūpeṇopakartuṃ yujyate /
SA19nagsaliu:89_8: ātmanaḥ saṃghātatvād hetupratyayayorutpādopalabdha ātmātmīya iti manyanākārapravṛtteḥ cittamevātmā ityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:89_9: atrāntaḥ karaṇapuruṣaḥ kūrmakeśasvabhāvavad yuktyanumānarahitastu kvacinnāstīti darśayitum bhagavatā bāhyādhyātmikabhāvānāṃ parata utpādo na yujyata ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:89_10: yadi bhāvānāṃ svato 'pi notpādo na ca parato 'pi,
SA19nagsaliu:89_11: tadā bhāvānāṃ dvividha utpāda iti cet,
SA19nagsaliu:89_13: na dvayoḥ na ca kālata ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:90_0: na svataḥ parataśca na / anye tu svaparayoḥ sambandhād bhāvotpādaṃ manyante /
SA19nagsaliu:90_2: tathāpi svato 'nupalabdhatvāt parataścābhāvāt na dvayoḥ ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:90_3: hetu-pratyayātiriktaṃ na svato na parata iti bhagavatā uktam /
SA19nagsaliu:90_5: tadā paratantreṇa kartrā utpādavināśau bhaviṣyata iti kaiściducyate /
SA19nagsaliu:90_6: anye tīrthikāstu karttā nāma kaścid ādyaḥkartā,
SA19nagsaliu:90_8: sa eva bāhyamābhyantarañcedaṃ sarvam utpādayati vināśayatīti manyante /
SA19nagsaliu:90_11: atha kasyeti cet- hetupratyayasambandhād bhāvānāṃ pravṛttirbhāsate /
SA19nagsaliu:90_12: kartustu ākāśavan nirvikāratvāt tadadhīnā utpāda-sthitivināśāśca naiva yujyante /
SA19nagsaliu:91_0: kasmāditi cet, karttari nirvikāra-niṣkriyākāśātmani kriyā karma ca kiñcidapi nāsti /
SA19nagsaliu:91_1: utpadyamānā bhāvā hetupratyayāpekṣāḥ pravṛtti-kramodbhūtā eva bhāsante /
SA19nagsaliu:91_2: yadanusāraṃ karttāramapekṣate pravṛttistadanusāraṃ bhāvānām utpāda-sthiti-vināśāśca sadā āsannā bhavanti /
SA19nagsaliu:91_3: karturnityatvād bhāvānām utpādao-sthiti-vināśā yugapad bhaviṣyanti athavā utpāda-sthiti-vināśā na bhaviṣyanti /
SA19nagsaliu:91_4: nityatvāt kvacidapi kiñcidapi utpādo vā vināśo vā na syāt /
SA19nagsaliu:91_5: hetuṃ pratyayañca apekṣya pravartamānānāṃ bhāvānāmeva kartṛ-kriyā-hetuphalotpādasamaḥ kramodbhava upalabhyate /
SA19nagsaliu:91_7: avikārahetubhiḥ parasparamāśritya pravartamānaiḥ utpādaniyamo na yujyate /
SA19nagsaliu:92_2: hetau phale ca saṃbhinne 'vikārastu kathaṃ bhavet /
SA19nagsaliu:93_1: kriyānanvitavandhyāputrātmani kasyāścit kriyāyāḥ karmaṇo vā niyatena ayuktatvād bhagavaddharmeṣu avisaṃvāditvād bhāvotpādakriyā karttāraṃ nāpekṣate,
SA19nagsaliu:93_2: kintu sati hetupratyayasaṅgrahe bhāvānāmutpādavināśau yujyeta ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:95_4: sukha-duḥkhādayaḥ svargo vimokṣaśca tāni sarvāṇi cittotpādamātreṇoddhṛtānīti vadanti /
SA19nagsaliu:95_6: atimandaprajñā eva, gatānugatikāścaiva yuktiviśeṣarahite tasmin gauravapravaṇatvāt pūrvottaraviruddhaṃ bālayuvakacāṇḍālavadayathārtha pratyakṣādiviruddhaṃ,
SA19nagsaliu:95_9: yuktyāgamādiviruddhaṃ ca vāṅmātreṇa pakṣīkṛtya nijājñānapaṭalena netrācchādanatvād asamarthatvāt paśubhūtāstu paśubhyo 'pyatichudratarāḥ paśavaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:95_12: utpāde sthitau ca sahetuka evābhyupagamyamāne sati nityavādabhaṅgatvād vādotsargaḥ,
SA19nagsaliu:95_14: icchāmātreṇa utpāde sati yugapadeva sampūrṇajagata utpādasthiti-vināśāḥ syuḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:96_3: taduddharaṇāyāso niṣphalaḥ / prayojanābhāve hi kalpanāpūrvaṅgamānāṃ pravṛttirnāsti,
SA19nagsaliu:96_4: prayojanāvyāpteḥ / tatprayojanavadvyāvṛttau kalpanāpūrvaṅgamānāṃ pravṛtterapi nivṛtteḥ asiddhārthatāsti /
SA19nagsaliu:98_1: tasmānna īśvaro hetuḥ / kasyacidapi bhāvasya utpāda-sthiti-vināśā na yujyante/
SA19nagsaliu:100_0: ekāntakriyāyuktā yuktayorgāmbhīryaguṇasya rūpādervā ālambana cintanasyaiva ayuktatvāt,
SA19nagsaliu:101_0: hetāvasati sarvatra pratyaya eva kathaṃ bhavet /
SA19nagsaliu:101_2: bhāvakartā maheśaścet so 'pi kartā na manyate /
SA19nagsaliu:101_3: pitrabhāve sutotpattiḥ sā neṣṭā dṛśyate na ca /
SA19nagsaliu:101_7: tathā maheśvare nitye bhāvānāṃ syāt sadodbhavaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:102_0: tasmādīśvarakartṛtvābhyupagame bahudoṣasaṃbhavād bhagavatā bhāvānām utpādaḥ īśvarakṛto na yujyate ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:102_1: pare tu sarvaṃ kālena vivartitaṃ manyante /
SA19nagsaliu:104_0: tadevam ucyate / atra kāla iti kiṃ nāma? nityo vā anityo vā,
SA19nagsaliu:105_0: sa nityaścettadā tatra kriyāpekṣā na yujyate /
SA19nagsaliu:106_1: sūryacandra-nakṣatra-parva-vatsarādi-bāhyābhyantarabhāvānāṃ gatagamyasvabhāvatvāt kālākhyayā bhāvānāmutpāda-sthiti-vināśāstu kālapariṇāmatvena na yujyante/
SA19nagsaliu:107_0: anyacca, svabhāvavādina āntarabāhyān sarvabhāvān svabhāvodbhavān manyante /
SA19nagsaliu:107_1: bhāvānāṃ svabhāva eva, kasyacidbhāvasya utpādasya vināśasya vā kaścidapi heturnāsti /
SA19nagsaliu:108_1: sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ cāpi sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ sadā sthitam /
SA19nagsaliu:108_4: vikāro vartate yatra nirvikāraḥ kathaṃ bhavet /
SA19nagsaliu:108_8: kule rājani kṣetrādau tatphalaṃ cāpi bhāsate /
SA19nagsaliu:108_9: svabhāve vikṛte jāte nityavādī tu bhraṃsate /
SA19nagsaliu:109_0: evaṃ svabhāvavādiṣvapi parasparavirodhatvād utpāda-sthiti-vināśānāṃ svabhāvād udbhavo na yujyata ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:109_1: atha bhāvānām utpāda-sthiti-vināśā ahetuto bhavanti ityapare 'hetuvādino hetuṃ vinaiva kevalam bhāvānāmutpāda-nirodhau kalpayanti /
SA19nagsaliu:109_5: tasmāttasyaiva doṣasya prasajyamānatvād ahetuvādo 'pi lokādi-viruddhatvād asiddha eva /
SA19nagsaliu:111_0: na svataḥ parato nāpi na dvayoḥ kartṛkālataḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:113_0: iti tu anādi-kālataḥ prapañca-vāsanābījasya avicchinna-nadīstrotaḥ-pravāhavad anupravṛtteḥ
SA19nagsaliu:115_0: tasmādeva sūtre atha punaḥ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśartudhātusamavāyād bīje nirudhyamāne aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:115_1: 'atha punaḥ' iti tu abhāvādudbhava-sva-para-dvaya-īśvarādi-rahita-bīja-pṛthivyādi-sāmagryā eva aṅkurādi utpadyata iti uktam /
SA19nagsaliu:117_0: pañcabhirhetubhiriti tu hetupañcakairiti, bāhyasyeti bījādeḥ / 'pratītyotpāda' iti pratītyam /
SA19nagsaliu:118_0: śāśvatato na cocchedān na saṅkrānteḥ parīttataḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:119_1: anyo 'ṅkuraḥ, na ca ya evāṅkurāstadeva bījam,
SA19nagsaliu:119_2: bījamevāpi nāṅkuraḥ / aniruddhād bījādapi aṅkuro notpadyate /
SA19nagsaliu:119_3: na ca niruddhād, tathāpi bījanirodhe aṅkura utpadyate /
SA19nagsaliu:119_4: tasmān na śāśvatato, na cocchedāditi na ca pūrvaniruddhādbījādaṅkuro niṣpadyate nācāpyaniruddhād /
SA19nagsaliu:119_5: api tu bījād niruddhāt tasminneva samaye 'ṅkuro utpadyate /
SA19nagsaliu:119_6: ato nocchedataḥ / na saṃkrāntitaḥ iti tu bījāṅkurau tu asadṛśau eva /
SA19nagsaliu:119_7: tasmāt 'na saṃkrāntitaḥ / parīttataḥ hetoriti- parīttabījavapanān mahāphalāvāptiriti tatparītta-hetorbahuphalābhinirvṛttiḥ,
SA19nagsaliu:119_10: sadṛśānuprabodhād iti tu yādṛśaṃ bījamupyate tādṛśameva phalābhinirvṛtiriti /
SA19nagsaliu:120_6: upte śālyādi bīje hi śyāmākādiphalaṃ na hi /
SA19nagsaliu:124_1: dvidhā hetuścapratyaya iti tu ādhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādo hetūpanibandhanaḥ pratyayopanibandhanaśca dvayākāro 'vagantavyaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:124_2: iṣṭa iti abhīṣṭasya ca abhipretasya abhimatasya cetyadhivacanam /
SA19nagsaliu:126_2: yattayormadhye syāt tat tu madhya iṣyate /
SA19nagsaliu:126_4: saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānam, vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpam, nāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanam,
SA19nagsaliu:126_5: ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśaḥ, sparśapratyayā vedanā, vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā, tṛṣṇāpratyaya mupādānam, upādānapratyayo bhavaḥ, bhavapratyayā jātiḥ, jātipratyayā jarāmaraṇa-śoka-parideva-duḥkha-daurmanasyopāyāsāḥ saṃbhavanti /
SA19nagsaliu:126_6: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati /
SA19nagsaliu:128_6: nāmarūpam, ṣaḍāyatanam, sparśo, vedanā, jātiḥ, jarāmaraṇañceti / apītipadaṃ saṃgrāhyatāṃ darśayati /
SA19nagsaliu:128_8: evam ayaṃ pratītyasamutpādo dvādaśāṅgaḥ trisvabhāvatayā veditavyaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:130_0: avidyā yadi nādau syādante mṛtyurna saṃbhaved /
SA19nagsaliu:131_0: 'avidyā yadi nādau syād' iti tu yadi avidyā cennābhaviṣyan naiva saṃskārāḥ prajñāsyante /
SA19nagsaliu:131_1: tadvad jarāmaraṇaparyantaṃ cennābhaviṣyan naiva śokādi prajñāsyate /
SA19nagsaliu:132_0: tebhyo bhinno na kutrāpi hyātmātmīyaśca vidyate /
SA19nagsaliu:133_0: tatrāvidyāyā naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ saṃskārādi abhinirvartayāmītyato jarāmaraṇaparyantaṃ naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ śokādi abhinirvartayāmīti /
SA19nagsaliu:133_2: evam yāvajjarāmaraṇasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati vayaṃ jātyādibhirabhinirvartitā iti /
SA19nagsaliu:139_0: asyeti tu ādhyātmikasya/ pratyayastu sāmagrī ṣaṭ prakārakā iti ṣaḍvidhāḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:141_0: vijñānasyānte parideśanatvād 'ante vijñānam' / ādike dharā ityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:142_0: tasmāt sūtre -ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāyāt pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśa-vijñānādistvādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:144_1: anyacca asmin kāye yatkiñcidasti tatsarvaṃ saṃgṛhya pṛthivīdhāturucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:144_2: anugraha tu saṃgrahaḥ, sambandho-mṛduḥ, āliṅganaṃ, piṇḍīkaraṇaṃ snigdhatā ca / tadyathā-aśru-sveda-kapha-siṃghāṇaka-majjā-śukra-mūtra-uccāra-rakta-lasīkā-mastaka-grahaṇī-pakvāśayādiḥ anyaccāsmin kāye tādṛśaṃ snigdha-svabhāvaṃ syājjaladhāturucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:145_1: anyacca yatkiñcitkaṃ tādṛśaṃ tatsarvaṃ tu tejodhāturucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:145_2: śvāsa iti vāyudhātuḥ / śvāsastu ucchvāsaḥ, āśvāso, bhāṣaṇaṃ, pralāpo, gamanāgamanaṃ kṣayo vṛddhiriti /
SA19nagsaliu:145_3: kāyasya vistāraḥ, saṅkocaḥ, kampanaṃ, calanaṃ, utkṣepaḥ, poṣaṇaṃ, vṛddhiḥ, pīnasaḥ, kāsaḥ, chikkā, ūrdhvavāyuradhovāyuranyaccāpi etatkāyamadhye yatkiñcit tādṛśamasti tatsarvam ekataḥ piṇḍīkṛtya vāyudhāturityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:147_2: tataḥ kliṣṭaṃ manaścāpi iti kleśamayaṃ manaḥ,
SA19nagsaliu:147_3: tāni ca caturmahābhūtāni ekataḥ piṇḍīkṛtya naḍakalāpayogena nāmarūpamityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:147_5: saṃjñā, saṃskāro vijñānaṃ ceti / rūpaṃ nāma pitroḥ śukraśoṇitodbhūtaṃ antarābhavamāśritya yat prathamaṃ nāmarūpābhinirvartanaṃ tanniśritya pūrvaṃnāmarūpābhinirvartanaṃ-manovijñānaṃ sāsravaṃ nivṛta-vyākṛta svabhāvam ātmamohādicatuḥkleśātmakam /
SA19nagsaliu:147_6: ātmamohaḥ, ātmamānam, ātmadṛṣṭiḥ, ātmotkarṣaścetyetatkleśasaṃyutaṃ kliṣṭaṃ mana iti ekataḥ piṇḍīkṛtaṃ nāmarūpamityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:149_0: anantaroditāḥ ṣaḍdhātavaḥ / sannipātād vai iti tu vaikalyābhāvāt /
SA19nagsaliu:149_2: utpādo nāma prādurbhāvaḥ / iṣyate iti tu anumatam / asya kartrādi na vartate iti bhāvaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:151_0: iti tu asmābhirete utpāditā iti ca tairvayamutpāditā iti te 'nyonya vikalpaṃ notpādayanti /
SA19nagsaliu:152_0: teṣu satsu samutpādaḥ teṣvasatsu na saṃbhavaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:155_2: na jīvaḥ calatvābhāvāt / na jantustu janyajanaka virahitatvāt /
SA19nagsaliu:155_5: 'na strī', na pumān - na napuṃsakastu ādhyātmikastrī puruṣa-napuṃsakātmakaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:155_6: na cāhaṃ mam iti tu ātmātmīya-manyanā-viyuktatvāt /
SA19nagsaliu:156_2: na sattvo, na jīvo, na jantuḥ, na manujo, na mānavo, na strī, na pumān, na napuṃsakam na cāhaṃ na mama syāt /
SA19nagsaliu:156_3: na ceśvarādi anyat kiñcid iti jñātavyam /
SA19nagsaliu:158_0: tatra katamāvidyā? ucyate / tribhavachādiketyucyate / tribhavastu bhavatrayam kāmabhavaḥ,
SA19nagsaliu:158_1: rūpabhavaḥ, arūpabhavaśca / te 'pi sattvabhājanaloke vyavahāreṇa dvividhāḥ vyavasthāpitāḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:159_1: kathamiti cet / ucyate - tatra kāmadhātuḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadāśrayanikāyavijñaptyavabhāsaṃ sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇa-svabhāvena ekapiṇḍatvena kalpayan saṃjñayā grahaṇatvād avidyeti ucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:160_1: tadbhinnastu vibhāgaḥ - grāma-nagara-nigama-śmaśāna-parvata-aṭavī-karvaṭa-dvīpa-nadī-vāyu-sāgara-palvala-taḍāga-kūpa-udyānasthāna-devālaya-mātṛgṛha-nāgaloka-maru-saras-vṛkṣa-śūnyālaya-mahāpatha-nadītaṭa-araṇyavāsa-prapāta-setu-kaulasthāna-mukha-mahāpatha-āpaṇa-catvara-śrṛṅgāṭaka-pāvanatīrthasthāna-jalāśayādiṣu sthitvā svakarmavaśena vijñaptyavabhāsa-vikalpodbhavānāṃ yadajñānaṃ seyamavidyā ityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:160_3: yonisthānāni catvāri-aṇḍajo, jarāyujaḥ, saṃsvedajaḥ, upapādukaśca / yonyāśrayabhedena vividhā tiryagjagad vijñaptyavabhāsita-vikalpavāsanāliptasantānāḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:161_0: tadanyathāvibhaktāḥ - gardabha-sūkara-vānara-gaja-uṣṭra-aśva-mṛga-mahiṣa-gau-gavaya-camarī-śva-śrṛgāla-nakula-mūṣaka-siṃha-vyāghra-tarakṣu-ṛkṣa-vṛka-mārjāra-mīna-kacchapa-makara-śiśumāra-sarpa-pipīlikā-lūtā-pataṃga-tittiri-pipīlaka-kṛmi-valmīka-godhā-kīṭa-jalavāsi-śuka-śārikā-kokilā-mayūra-haṃsa-krauñca-vaka-kāka-gṛdhra-ullūka-jīvañjīva-suparṇādayo 'niścita-gatitvāt svakarmavāsanā-pāratantryeṇa avabhāsākāraṃ sthitaṃ tu yadajñānaṃ tadapi avidyā ityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:162_0: tadbhinnavibhāgena sthitaṃ parvata-aṭavī-vana-udyāna-nadī-grāmādiṣu svakarma-vaśāt prajñaptāvabhāsa-vikalpanodbhūtamanyasthānānāṃ yadajñānaṃ tadapi avidyetyucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:162_1: naraka-sattvānāṃ svakarmavaśitānukūlavikalpanodbhavānāṃ tu anavataptamahāsāgarād viṃśatisāhasra-yojanādhobhājanasya vijñapti-svabhāvamūlabhūteṣu anyasthāneṣvabhi-nirvṛttiḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:162_4: dakṣiṇasyāṃ jambūdvīpaḥ, paścimāyāṃ aparagodānīyaḥ, uttarasyāṃ, ca kururiti / aṣṭāvantardvīpāstu pūrvayāṃ videhaparṣado deho videhaśca /
SA19nagsaliu:163_2: svavijñānāvabhāsavikalpanāvaśenodbhūtaṃ vibhinnaprapaṃca-vāsanāliptaṃ tādṛśaṃ yadajñānam idamapi avidyetyucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:163_10: evaṃ pṛthaggati-yoni-bahutva-bhedena vibhinna-sattvabhājanalokā ityākhyātāḥ sādhāraṇā-sādhāraṇaviśeṣādipiṇḍagrahodbhūta ekataḥ saṃkṣipya kāmadhāturityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:164_1: narā dvādaśa, ṣaḍ devāḥ ṣoḍaśa narakāstathā /
SA19nagsaliu:166_1: aparicchinnam, avyaktā-varaṇam, anavabodham, aparijñātāmisraṃ pūrvānta-aparānta-madhya-hetu-karma-phala-satya-ratna-duḥkha-samudaya-nirodha-mārgakaṃ yadajñānaṃ sāvidyā/
SA19nagsaliu:166_4: piṇḍasaṃjñā, nityasaṃjñā, dhruvasaṃjñā, śāśvatasaṃjñā, sukhasaṃjñā, ātmasaṃjñā, satva(saṃjñā), jīva(saṃjñā), puruṣasaṃjñā, pudgala(saṃjñā), manuja(saṃjñā), mānava(saṃjñā), ahaṃkāra-mamakārasaṃjñā / evamādi vividhamajñānamiyamucyate 'vidyeti deśitam /
SA19nagsaliu:166_6: paramāṇūnāṃ parasparaṃ saṃcayātmakatvāt piṇḍagrāho na yujyate /
SA19nagsaliu:166_14: kriyābhāvān na jīvasaṃjñā / api ca / gamanāgamanarahitatvān na pudgalasaṃjñā asti /
SA19nagsaliu:166_17: evaṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ tadanityādisvabhāvasya yadajñānaṃ iyamavidyetyucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:167_0: tatra avidyeti tu vidyā na bhūtatvād avidyā /
SA19nagsaliu:167_1: na tu vidyābhāvaḥ, abhāvastu na kiñcidapi / avidyā vidyābhinnā vidyāntaramevasti /
SA19nagsaliu:167_3: paratvamapi nāsti / atha kimiti cet? virodhaḥ / avidyā tu na vidyābhāvaḥ vidyādharmato viruddhā avidyeti ucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:169_5: jñānaṃ samādhiḥ rūpaṃ ca vaśitāprativedinaḥ / ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:170_0: tatrāpi yadakliṣṭamajñānam, adarśanam, anabhisaṃmatam, anavabodhabhāvanāmārga-jñānotpāda-bādhakaṃ tadapyavidyā ityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:170_1: tasmādavidyātamastimirapaṭalena nayanāvṛtatvād viṣayeṣu rūpa-śabda-gandha-rasa-sparśa-dharmākāravijñaptiviparyaya-vikalpavāsanāvabhāsatvena nitya-ātma-sukha-śucyādi-viparyāsatvād rāga-dveṣa-moha-vistārād rāgajaṃ karmāpi abhisaṃskaroti /
SA19nagsaliu:170_3: amārge mārgasaṃjñatvād, aśuciṣu śucisaṃjñatvād, amuktau mukti saṃjñatvācca mohajamapi abhisaṃskaroti /
SA19nagsaliu:171_0: tatpratyayāt tannidānācca vidyāyāṃ rāga-dveṣa-moha-ahaṃkāra-dṛṣṭi-saṃśaya-īrṣyā-mātsaryānugāmanād akuśala-kāyakarmata ātmano jñānasya ca paritrāṇārtha prāṇātipātaḥ adattādānaṃ,
SA19nagsaliu:171_6: ityuktam / tatra avidyayā iti avidyā-pratyayena saṃskārabhāvābhisaṃskāritvād vibhāvitaṃ saṃskārabhāva-prativijñaptisvabhāvaṃ vijñānamabhinirvartate /
SA19nagsaliu:173_0: iti uktam / tataḥ iti tu saṃskāramāśritya bhāvānāṃ vijñaptiriti tu vijñāpakatvād vijñaptiḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:175_0: iti vijñānena sahodgatā iti tu vijñānasya hetuta udbhūtāḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:175_1: catuḥskandhā arūpiṇaḥ / iti tu catvāro vijñāna-skandhāḥ vedanā-saṃjñā-saṃskāra-vijñānamityādayaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:178_0: iti yatpūrvaṃ indriye satṛṣṇavāsanānāmarūpaṃ sthāpitaṃ tannāmarūpaṃ saṃniśritya cakṣurādi-ṣaḍindriyābhinirvartanena indriyasya ṣaḍāyatanāni prādurbhavantīti /
SA19nagsaliu:180_1: indriyavijñānaṃ rūpādiviṣayeṣu sparśa iva nirāntarameva pravartate /
SA19nagsaliu:180_3: asaṃcita-pañcavijñānāni saṃcita viṣayendriyaiḥ saha yugapadekatra bhūtatvāt sparśavanti santi,
SA19nagsaliu:180_4: na tu sparśa ityucyate / tasmādeva bhagavatāpi trayāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśa ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:180_6: tadvat sparśarasāsvādaniyantraṇe ṣaṭsparśā kāyānāśritya ṣaḍvedanākāyā utpadyante /
SA19nagsaliu:180_8: ityuktam / vedanā tu sparśeṇa janitā sparśahetūdbhavā ityadhivacanam /
SA19nagsaliu:181_2: vedanāvabhāsākāravijñapti vikalpanāvaśodbhūtānāṃ trivargabhedena ṣaḍvedanākāyotpādād bhagavatā sparśasahabhavā vedanetyuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:181_3: tadvat kiñcidvedanāsvādasaktā abhiniveśātmikā hi vedanāhetukī tṛṣṇeti tṛṣṇodbhavaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:182_0: tṛṣṇeti tridhāturāgaḥ / rāgo 'dhyavasānam, abhilāṣaḥ, āsaktiraviyogākāṃkṣā, nandanaṃ, prema ityadhivacanam / sā ca indriyaviṣayavijñānabhedena tṛṣṇākāyaḥ ṣaḍdhā vyavasthāpitā /
SA19nagsaliu:183_2: upādānārthena upādānam / upapañcamādānaṃ upādānam / yathāgṛhīta-svakarma-pathyadanasya paravaśād upādānādutpādaḥ punarbhava ityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:184_3: skandhotpādo bhavājjātaḥ / karmabhavasya taddhetoḥ skandhotpādo jātirityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:185_4: pratihananaṃ, vināśanam ityadhivacanam / evamabhinirvṛttau utpādahetunā jātipratyayena jaraiva abhinirvartate,
SA19nagsaliu:186_1: daurbalya-khālitya-pālitya-balikāpūrṇatā-vibhugnatā-kubjatva-daurbalya-kharakharatva-daṇḍāvaṣṭambha caryāvyakti-indriyabhraṃśa-smṛtibhraṃśāḥ iti tādṛśī tu jāti-pratyayena bhinirvartita-skandhānāṃ svakarmākāriṇī vijñaptyavabhāsa-vikalpanāvāsanā-vaśenotpannā jīrṇatā jaretyucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:188_4: antāvasthā, antaśayanaṃ, vijñānasaṃkramaṇaṃ, ūṣmahāniḥ, āyurviyogaḥ, kāyikānukaulyatyāgaḥ, bhavasaṃkrāntiḥ, yaśca vijñānāntimāvasthāśrayocchedādyutpanno bahudhāpralāpaḥ,
SA19nagsaliu:188_5: grahaṇam, daurbalyaṃ, parijīrṇatā, dainyaṃ, nirodhānirodhakaḥ, mukhadaurvarṇyaṃ, anāthatā, svakarmavikalpanodbhūta-yamapuruṣaiḥ paraspara-samādānāvabhāsavijñaptiḥ,
SA19nagsaliu:188_7: prakampaḥ, kaṇṭhapariśoṣaṇam, nāsikācchedaḥ, svedaḥ, kledo malaṃ, svamūtroccāra-lālāśarīralepaḥ,
SA19nagsaliu:189_0: mūḍhe tu maraṇācchokaḥ / iti satṛṣṇasya antardāhaḥ śokaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:189_2: śocanārthena śokaḥ / atha mama priyavastu-iṣṭavastu-viyogo bhaviṣyati iti khidyamānasya santāpācchoka ityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:189_4: hāhā, kiṃ, kena, katham, kutra śaraṇaṃ gatvā paśyāmi, iha gacchāmi, gato 'ham, gṛhītaḥ, hataḥ, mṛtaḥ, bhakṣitaḥ, vinaṣṭaḥ, pranaṣṭaḥ, aho mātaḥ, aho pitaḥ, bhrātaḥ, bhagini, putra, putri, he bhārya iti anekadhā pralāpo mithyāpadanirnādotpannaḥ pailottakasaṃtāpo daurmanasyam /
SA19nagsaliu:189_5: tasmāt śokataścāpalāpo yo daurmanasyaṃ sa ucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:193_3: sa tu kleśo 'pyucyate, upāyāsa ityucyate / tatra eṣāṃ dvādaśabhavāṅgānām anvartha nāmāni darśayituṃ - tamo 'bhijñānāmarūpāyatasparśavittarṣataḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:196_0: bhāvārthena jātiḥ, pākārthena jarā / vināśārthena maraṇam / śocanārthena śokaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:198_3: upakleśārthena upāyāsāḥ / punastattvāparijñetyādi tu parīkṣārthaṃ pradarśanārtham uktam /
SA19nagsaliu:200_2: avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ vibhinnāḥ saṃskārā abhinirvartante puṇyopagāḥ,
SA19nagsaliu:200_3: apuṇyopagāḥ, āneñjyopagāḥ/ tatra puṇyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ puṇyopagameva vijñānaṃ bhavati /
SA19nagsaliu:201_5: yajjātīyaḥ sparśo bhavati, tajjātīyā vedanā pravartate /
SA19nagsaliu:201_8: abhinandati, adhyavasāyaṃ tiṣṭhati sā vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇetyucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:201_9: āsvādanādhyavasānādhyavasāyasthānādātmapriyarūpa-sātarūpa-viyogo mābhūditi yasya bhūyaḥ praṇidhānamiyaṃ tṛṣṇā pratyayopādānetyucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:201_10: evaṃ prārthayamānaḥ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma samutthāpayati kāyena vācā manasā ca sa upādāna-pratyayo bhava ityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:201_11: tatkarmanirjātānāṃ pañcaskandhānām abhinirvṛttiryā sā bhavapratyayo jātirityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:207_1: atha cemānyasya catvāryaṅgāni hetuḥ saṃghātakārakāṇi ca,
SA19nagsaliu:207_2: dvādaśāṅgasya pratītyasamutpādasya catvāryaṅgāni saṃghātakriyāyai hetutvena pravartante /
SA19nagsaliu:208_0: avidyā ca tṛṣā karma vijñānaṃ kramaśo matāḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:209_0: avidyā, tṛṣṇā, karma, vijñānañceti yathākramam / heturvijñānabījaṃ hi / vijñānaṃ bīja-svabhāvatvena hetuḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:212_4: vijñāne na karomīdaṃ na vijñānamito matam /
SA19nagsaliu:213_0: tatra karmaṇo 'pi naivaṃ bhavati ityādi tu karmaṇo 'pi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ vijñāna-bījasya kṣetrakāryaṃ karomi/
SA19nagsaliu:213_1: tṛṣṇāyā api ityādi tu evaṃ tṛṣṇāyā api naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ vijñānabījaṃ snehayāmīti /
SA19nagsaliu:213_2: avidyāyā api ityādi tu avidyāyā api naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ vijñānabījamavakiromīti /
SA19nagsaliu:213_3: vijñānasyāpi ityādi tu naivaṃ bhavati ahamebhiḥ pratyayairjanitamiti /
SA19nagsaliu:216_0: avidyā-svavaskara iti svavaskareṇa ca sadṛśena svavaskaraṃ sarveṣvanugata-tvāt /
SA19nagsaliu:218_0: iti tu hetu pratyayasāmagyā utpādastu nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati / nāmarūpāṅkuram ityādestu /
SA19nagsaliu:220_0: nāmarūpāṅkuramidaṃ tu svayaṃ parata ubhayādito notpannam / atha kīdṛśam iti cet /
SA19nagsaliu:222_0: piturmātuḥ samāgamād ityādi tu pitṛmātṛsaṃyogo vā saktiḥ,
SA19nagsaliu:222_1: samāgamaḥ, yuktatvam, putraprasūtisāmarthyam, ṛtumatvañca / 'tridivasātyaye rajonivṛttistu' sa hi strīṇām ṛturucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:222_3: svayaṃ gandharvasyāpi citta-viparyaye 'pi mātāpitṛkriyādhimuktau garbhotpādakrameṇa kalala-arbuda-peśī-ghana-praśākhāvasthāmatikramya prasūtasya,
SA19nagsaliu:224_0: atha ca mātāpitṛsaṃyogād-ṛtusamavāyād anyeṣāṃ ca pratyayānāṃ samavāyāttatrāsvādaviddhaṃ vijñānabījaṃ mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati /
SA19nagsaliu:226_0: tasmād asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣu amameṣu aparigraheṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu hetupratyayānāmavaikalyādityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:227_0: asvāmikeṣu iti tu antaḥ karaṇaṃ puruṣādi anupalambhanasvabhāvamasti /
SA19nagsaliu:227_3: amama iti ātmātmīyarahitaḥ / aparigraha iti tu īśvarādi-parigrahānupalambhāt /
SA19nagsaliu:227_4: māyālakṣaṇa-svabhāva iti yathā māyā tu abhūtāpi vividhavyavahāraṃ pratipādayati,
SA19nagsaliu:227_7: vinaśyati vā / yathāpi hetupratyayavaikalyatvād bhāvānām anutpādastadavabodhayituam upamā /
SA19nagsaliu:230_0: tasmāt cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpañcālokañcākāśañca tajjamanasikārañca ityādi uktam /
SA19nagsaliu:230_1: tatra cakṣuriti rūpaṃ draṣṭuṃ cakṣurindriyaṃ vikalaṃ bhavati /
SA19nagsaliu:231_1: āloka iti candra-nakṣatrāgni-auṣadhi-maṇi-prabhānām abhivyaktyai āloko 'pi upasthitaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:233_0: cakṣurvijñānasya pratyayeṣu kasyacidapyabhāve na cakṣurvijñānasyotpādaḥ, sati cotpādo bhavati /
SA19nagsaliu:234_0: mayā te janitā iti / vikalpo na yathodeti
SA19nagsaliu:235_0: iti tatra cakṣuṣo naivaṃ bhavati 'ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyāśraya-kṛtyaṃ karomīti /
SA19nagsaliu:235_1: rūpasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati, ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyālambanakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
SA19nagsaliu:235_2: ālokasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyāvabhāsakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
SA19nagsaliu:235_3: ākāśasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyāvaraṇakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
SA19nagsaliu:235_4: tajjamanasikārasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya samanvāhāra-kṛtyaṃ karomīti /
SA19nagsaliu:236_0: atha ca punaḥ satsveṣu pratyayeṣu cakṣurvijñānasyotpattirbhavati / asatsveṣu na bhavati / evaṃ
SA19nagsaliu:243_3: asmāditi tu asmāllokāt paraṃ lokam athavā paralokād amuṃ lokaṃ kaściddharmo na saṃkrāmati /
SA19nagsaliu:243_4: yadyevaṃ nityavādo vā ahetu-pratikūla-hetuvādo vā bhaviṣyatīti cet /
SA19nagsaliu:244_0: tatra saṅkrāntyabhāve 'pi karmaphalāvināśitvaṃ pratyakṣānumāna-viśvastāgama-prakhyātena anenodāharaṇena jñātavyam /
SA19nagsaliu:246_0: tasmād uktam / tadyathā- supariśuddha ādarśamaṇḍale mukha-pratibimbakaṃ dṛśyate /
SA19nagsaliu:248_0: taditi tu mukham ādarśaśca / anyonyam iti parasparam anyonyam /
SA19nagsaliu:248_2: kartṛkriyāvihīnaṃ tad iti tatra kartā kriyā ca na staḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:248_3: kiṃ tannocchidyata iti cet- tathotpādāvabhāsanam ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:248_4: kathaṃ kartṛvihīnaṃ kriyā karma ca bhaviṣyatīti ucyate- pūrvavṛddhikramācca syāt /
SA19nagsaliu:249_1: parītto dakapātrānte dṛśyate na ca krāmati /
SA19nagsaliu:250_1: atha ca punaḥ parītte 'bhyudakabhājane candrasya pratibimbaṃ dṛśyate /
SA19nagsaliu:251_0: api ca, tadyathāgnirupādāne pratyaye sati jvalati upādāna-vaikalyānna jvalati /
SA19nagsaliu:251_1: evameva karmakleśajanitaṃ vijñānabījaṃ tatra tatropapattyāyatana-pratisandhau mātuḥkukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati /
SA19nagsaliu:253_0: tatra bāhyapratītyasamutpādasya kriyākarma-vyavasthā tu kalpanātmikā jñeyā /
SA19nagsaliu:257_7: svasaṃvedanaḥ, aparādhīno viśvarūpamaṇiratnarāja iva anuttaro dharmakāya ityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:259_1: ityuktam / katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ? uktam / na śāśvatato / yasmādanye maraṇāntikāḥ skandhā anya aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:259_2: na tu ya eva maraṇāntikāḥ skandhāsta evaupapattyaṃśikāḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:259_4: ya eva vināśa-hetussa evāpi aupapattiko bhaviṣyati /
SA19nagsaliu:259_5: ato maraṇāntikāḥ skandhā nirudhyante aupapattyaṃśikā skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti /
SA19nagsaliu:259_6: ato na śāśvatataḥ / na ca pūrvaniruddheṣu maraṇāntikeṣu skandheṣu iti niruddhaya na ciraṃ gatatvād aupapattyaṃśikā iti aupapattyaṃśe niśritatvād aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti /
SA19nagsaliu:259_7: maraṇāntikā aniruddhā eva / aupapattyaṃśikaḥ skandhaḥ prādurbhavet,
SA19nagsaliu:259_8: tada-yuktatvāduktam- api tu maraṇāntikāḥ skandhā nirudhyante,
SA19nagsaliu:259_9: tasminneva ca samaye aupapattyaṃśikā skandhā prārdubhavanti,
SA19nagsaliu:259_10: tulādaṇḍonnāmāvanāmavat / ato nocchedataḥ, visadṛśāḥ sattvanikāyāḥ sabhāgāyāṃ jātyāṃ jātimabhinirvartayanti /
SA19nagsaliu:260_3: yaḥ kaścid imaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ samyakpraṇītamevaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā satatasamitamajīvaṃ yathāvadaviparītamajātamabhūtamakṛtamasaṃskṛtamapratighamanālambaṃ śivamabhayamavyupaśamasvabhāvaṃ paśyati /
SA19nagsaliu:261_15: tucchata iti muktātmano hrasvalohavad ekāntasya abhāvāt /
SA19nagsaliu:261_21: anityata iti sahopapādavināśaḥ skandhāt pṛthaganyana svabhāvāt /
SA19nagsaliu:261_23: śūnyata iti kalpanā svabhāvatayā abhūta-parikalpanāyāḥ pṛthakatvābhāvāt /
SA19nagsaliu:262_2: kiṃ kathaṃ vā kutaḥ kena kalpavādādi hānitaḥ/
SA19nagsaliu:263_0: tathatārthaṃ sa eva pūrvāntaṃ na pratisarati ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:263_3: ahaṃ devo vā gandharvo vā kiṃ sukhavihāro duḥkhavihāro 'bhūvamityayaṃ moho'bhāva eva /
SA19nagsaliu:263_4: ahaṃ sugatau durgatau vā, ciram, aciram vā kathamabhūvamiti moho 'pyabhāva eva /
SA19nagsaliu:263_5: anāgatānte na pratisarati / kiṃ nvahaṃ bhaviṣyāmyanāgate 'dhvani iti ca āhosvinna bhaviṣyāmi iti moho 'pyatra nāstyeva /
SA19nagsaliu:263_6: kiṃ nvahaṃ bhaviṣyāmyanāgate 'dhvani iti anāgate 'dhvani devo vā piśāco vā naro vā kiṃ vā bhaviṣyāmīti atra mohasyāpyanudbhava eva /
SA19nagsaliu:263_7: sukhī vā duḥkhī vā surūpo vā kurūpo vā kathaṃ bhaviṣyāmi iti moho 'pyatra nāsti /
SA19nagsaliu:263_8: antarapi na pratisarati iti antarna muhyati /
SA19nagsaliu:263_9: kiṃ nvidamiti ātmā nirātmā vā iti /
SA19nagsaliu:263_10: kathaṃ nvidamiti kiṃ sarūpo 'thavā virūpo veti moho 'tra nodbhavati /
SA19nagsaliu:263_11: ke santa iti sukṛta-karmakāriṇaḥ duṣkṛta-karmakāriṇo veti na mohotpādaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:263_12: ayaṃ sattvo devagaternaragatervā kuta āgata itaścyuto deveṣu manuṣyeṣu narake prete tiryañci vā kutra gamiṣyatīti moho 'tra na sambhavati /
SA19nagsaliu:263_18: viparītadhāraṇā-samutthānārthaṃ pudgalavāda-pratisaṃyuktānītyādi tu punargamanatvāt pudgala iti skandha-vyatiriktaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:263_19: yasyāmuṃ lokaṃ tyaktvā paraloka-gamanasya paralokaṃ vihāya amuṃ etallokagamanasya cābhāvāt grahaṇa-durviparītagrahaṇamityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:263_27: aśucau śucisaṃjñā, amunau munisaṃjñayā ṣaḍjagaccakra-praviṣṭa-buddhimato gamanaṃ gamyaṃ ca saṃsāramevānusaranti na tu nirvāṇamiti /
SA19nagsaliu:263_28: teṣāṃ samyak prajñayā darśane caturvidhaviparyaya-rahitatvāt samucchinnamūlāni tālavṛkṣamastakavadanābhāsagatāni āyatyāmanutpāda-nirodhadharmāṇi iti /
SA19nagsaliu:267_0: tathā iti yathā candrasya rūpe dūrasthite 'pi parīttajalabhājaneṣu jale vipulatailapātreṣu vā avabhāsate /
SA19nagsaliu:267_3: evam asmānna kaściccyuto na gato nāgato,
SA19nagsaliu:267_5: tadvajjalabhājanavat sattvasantānasya jagataḥ sthānāntareṣu bahurūpeṇa cittacandrabimbotpādaḥ,
SA19nagsaliu:267_10: karmakleśa-lipta-cittasantānaṃ vahnistrotonibaddhamindhanaṃ tu karmakleśata eva syāditi parīkṣyate /
SA19nagsaliu:267_12: indhanābhāve vicchinnam, tadvad atrāpi karmakleśendhanamucchidya saṃkleśālaya-vijñānabījao-santāne jñānāgni-saṃyogād dagdhe sati hetu-nirodhān na phalodbhavaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:267_13: tasmādevoktam - yānyekeṣāṃ śramaṇa-brāhmāṇānāṃ tadyathā iti ito bāhyānām lokastu lokaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:268_0: naśyan-naśyan gatyarthaḥ, lujyatatvāllokaḥ / viśīryamāṇa ityadhivacanam / dṛṣṭigatānīti dṛgdarśanam viparīta-śāstraśravaṇacintanādimithyā-jñānodbhavaṃ mithyā-jñānaṃ tu dṛṣṭirityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:268_1: pṛthak tu bhinnam / tadyathā - ātmavāda-pratisaṃyuktānītyādi tu pañcopādāna-skandheṣu rūpa-vedanā-saṃjñā-saṃskāra-vijñārnoṣvati ātmātmīya-rahiteṣu,
SA19nagsaliu:268_5: yaścāpi saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣadharmasmṛtyupasthāna-samyakprahāṇa-ṛddhipāda-indriya-bala-bodhyaṅga-mārga-pratītyasamutpāda-dhyāna-arūpi-apramāṇa-ṣaḍanusmṛtyādiyadharmapudgalanairātmya-bodhicittabhāvanā-samādhi-dhāraṇā-śraddhā-vīrya-samādhi-prajñā-bhūmi-vaśīkārā-bhijñāna-jñāna-pāramitā-vimuktidvāra-kṣānti-bhāvanādi-krameṇa lokottaramārgānugata-tvād adhimukticaryāyāṃ pratisthāpya niryāṇa-prayoga-sākṣātkārād indriya-bala-abhayao-asaṃsṛṣṭa-pratisaṃvid-vyañjana-mahāpuruṣa-lakṣaṇa-ṛddhipādādi bhāvanāṃ paripūrya anuttarasamyak-samavabodhāvabodhāt śamatha-vipaśyanānukūla-samabhāvo bhāvane 'nantā-cintyaguṇyaṃ śāntasvabhāvakāyaṃ,
SA19nagsaliu:268_7: tatra rūpaskandhastu rūpāvabhāsākāra-vijñaptyavabhāsa-vikalpodbhūto 'neka-dravyātmako bhūtabhautika-rūpa-lakṣaṇa ekādaśao-sāmānyātmaka-pañcadravyākārāropa-saṃghaṭṭitaḥ cakṣuḥ-śrotrādirūpa-śabdādikāma-rūpa-arūpa-pratisaṃyuktābhūtaparikalpanā-lakṣaṇaḥ skandho dhātvāyatana-indriya-vijñāna-viṣayātmako 'tha ca tādṛganyatādṛgrūpa-lakṣaṇo dharmastu rūpaskandha iti /
SA19nagsaliu:269_8: pūrvākṣiptālaya-vijñānād astitva-vāsanā-bhedena tu dhātoḥ ākāra-viśeṣānanta-prasarānvitasya saṃskāra-skandha-saṃgṛhītatvāt saṃskāraskandha iti /
SA19nagsaliu:269_11: vikalpanāvaśodbhūtālaya-vijñānasya vāsanopanibaddhatvād dhātorākāra-viśeṣa-bhedenānantaprasaro hi vijñānaskandha iti /
SA19nagsaliu:270_2: tathāpi tatra ādāveva kartrādirahito riktastuccho 'sāra iti viditvā caturāryasatya-bhāvanānulomapravṛttyā nirṇīto lokottara-jñānāgni-samudbhūto-'vidyāndhakārādi-rahito hetupratyayārthatathatāparijñānāt śānto dharmakāyo 'vagamyate /
SA19nagsaliu:271_1: tatra duḥkha-satyam-anityatā-duḥkhatā-śūnyatā-nairātmya-samyaganudarśanajñānena kṣānti-mukti-prahāṇa-viśeṣānāntaryajñānena ca tad-duḥkhamavagamya kleśālayavijñānavāsanāṃ saṃnihatya pudgaladharmanairātmyam avabudhya,
SA19nagsaliu:271_3: skandhādau dhātau āyatane ca grāhya-grāhakatāṃ vihāya dharmanairātmyasamatāyāṃ praviśe,
SA19nagsaliu:271_5: sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatājñānasya karuṇāmūlaka-bodhicittasya hetūbhūta-vividhopāya-puṇyajñānasambhārasaṃcaye daśapāramitāhetubhiḥ daśabhūmyādhāra daśajñānālambana-daśavaśitāphalānvite 'nantācintya-guṇākāraḥ śāntadharmakāyo 'vabudhyate /
SA19nagsaliu:271_8: hetupratyayao-rahitatvāt mārgasatye 'pi mārga-nyāya-pratipatti-nairyāṇika-sandarśane evaṃ darśana-bhāvanā-ānantarya-prahāṇa-vimukti-viśeṣamārgānukūlatāyai ālayavijñāne vidyamānāṃ vāsanāṃ saṃnihatya pudgaladharma-nairātmya-samatāvabodhāt trikāyādhiṣṭhāna-śānta-dharmakāyasyācintyā-prameyaguṇa-gaṇasya ādimadhyāntarahitasya avicchinna-nābhogakaraṇātmaka-sarvārthānāṃ anuttaraṃ sarvajñatvaṃ prāpnoti /
SA19nagsaliu:272_0: ya evaṃ tathatākṣamaḥ / tasmai vyākriyate nūnaṃ
SA19nagsaliu:273_1: sa eva pudgaladharmanairātmyakṣamatānvitatvād anuttarasamyaksambodhiṃ vyākṛtavat paśyet,
SA19nagsaliu:273_2: jānīyāccetyarthaḥ / tasmāt sūtre- yo bhadanta śāriputra kulaputro kuladuhitā vā evaṃvidha-dharmakṣānti-samanvitaḥ,
SA19nagsaliu:273_3: tasya tathāgato 'rhat samyaksambuddho 'nuttaraḥ samyaksambodhiṃ vyākaroti ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:275_1: bodhisattvo maitreyo 'pi śālistambopamā kṛtā idaṃ sūtram vistareṇa vibhajya bhāṣitavān /
SA19nagsaliu:275_2: bodhisattvamaitreyeṇa bhāṣitāṃ śālistambopamāṃ kṛtvā śāriputrastu tacchrutvā iti śālistambopamā kṛtā /
SA19nagsaliu:275_6: anumoditeti anumodya / saḥstuta iti tvayā yathoktaḥ tathaiva asti nānyatheti,
SA19nagsaliu:277_0: tasmādeva sūtre- atha āyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyasya bodhisattvasya bhāṣitam abhinandya utthāyāsanāt prakrānta ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:277_1: maitreyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evamuktaṃ maitreyeṇa bodhisattvena,
SA19nagsaliu:277_3: anumoditam / śāriputraḥ tacchutvā praharṣitaḥ santuṣṭa ityarthaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:277_4: gatvā bhikṣubhyo gambhīrodārādbhutaṃ sūtraṃ yathāśrutavat sarvasattvahitāya bhāṣitam /
SA19nagsaliu:280_0: bhāratīyopādhyāyena dharmaśrībhadreṇa lokacakṣuṣā bhadantasādhumatinā jñāna kumāreṇa cānūditā /
